Randall promoted the east coast types into leadership roles after the ATT merger who make the daily decisions of how things are run at the expense of many SW leaders and rank and file who lost their jobs as a result. The former AT&T was a sinking ship with all it's East coast leadership who made one bad decision after another and was eventually rescued by SBC only because of it's wireless service. East coast leadership, I don't think so.

Message.Title: Cautious increase
Message.Msg: This twelve cent increase has been a hard battle with prices carried out to the fourth decimal point. On 4/24 when T dropped 5% the low was $36.63. Today it was $36.35 and it does not look as if we will reach the $37.04 close of 4/24. Volume was very high that day and is only about 60% of average volume today. This increase could be due to the news that "AT&T Inc. (T) has added a new monthly administrative fee of 61 cents to the bills of all of its contract wireless lines as of May 1, a move that could bring in more than a half-billion dollars in annual revenue." If so it could have legs and carry us back to $38 or more.

CT.. 'NO' is not enough.. several years ago, I made a statement at the Union Hall that 'our' Union was letting it's members down. ( it was actually a 5 minute accusation ) ,, you get the short version. It ended by me warning my Local that if changes weren't made I would show the members how to get out and so I did. I helped many members drop the union hoping that if I touched the wallet of the Union that they would stop being puppets for AT&T. I eventually retired and it appears that nothing has changed. My point is that your union probably doesn't care about you so stop supporting their abusive way. My way didn't work so I suggest contacting the teamsters or some other representative and seeing what it would take to get them to negotiate and protect your interests. Good luck.

Message.Title: AT&T INTERNET SERVICE AND MAINTENANCE
Message.Msg: I AM 70 YEARS OLD HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY INTERNET CONNECTION ALSO PHONE SERVICE DISCONNECTING CONSTANTLY FOR OVER 1 1/2 YEARS. AT&T TALKED ME INTO TRANSFERRING TO U VERS FROM STATIC TO DYNAMIC LINES. AND STILL HAVING PROBLEMS ON A CONSTANT BASIS. I HAVE CALLED SUPPORT NUMEROUS TIMES THRU OUT THE YEAR AND A HALF. TALKED TO SUPERVISORS AND MANAGERS.HAD MANY TECHNICIANS TROUBLESHOOT MY SYSTEM . AND HAVE FOUND MANY PROBLEMS .LIKE NOISY LINES ,DISCONNECT GROUND CABLE ON THE MAIN JUNCTION BOX. AND ALSO WEATHER RELATED PROBLEMS WITH MOISTURE . MY PAIRS CABLE WAS REPLACED DID NOT HELP. MY HISTORY IN THE MILITARY WAS CENTRAL OFFICE REPAIR.MAIN FRAME, PATCH PANELS ,SWITCH BOARDS. I DO UNDERSTAND STAND WHAT IS HAPPENING. HERE R SUM OF THE PEOPLE THAT HAVE SERVICED THE PROBLEM FOR THE LAST YEAR AND A HALF . Tinicko griffin,mark gertonson. these tech have been to my house and agree that the problem is from the pole to to the main junction box located 1 block from my house. that is 2 names i had at least 5 to 7 techs out to check for this problem since jan 2013 or since uvers was installed . supervisors by the name of willy , managers (don jones employee #DJ755N) (J M EMPLOYEE#). THIS IS NOT ALL THE PEOPLE I HAVE TALKED TO. I DAY TRADE STOCKS AND OPTION AND HAVE LOST MONEY BECAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM. AND I AM ALSO A CANCER PATIENT.AND THAT MEANS WHEN DISCONNECTED I HAVE NO PHONE. CAN ANYONE HELP ME WITH THIS PROBLEM. LIKE MAYBE (MR.RANDALL L STEPHENSON) THIS PROBLEM HAPPENS THRU OUT THE BLOCK I LIVE ON. THANK U ED S

Ask your AT&T tech if they have checked your inside wiring from the box on the outside of your house to your gateway. See if you might have a "bridge tap" somewhere due to old wiring that doesn't have "twist". They could then update that wiring to a new, much higher grade of wiring, and maybe even add a new phone jack near your computer. Good luck!

I had a problem with VZ ref. poor & frequently interupted (dropped calls) service. After 4 or 5 trouble complaints over a 2 & 1/2 to 3 month period .. I finally filed an 'on-line complaint' with FCC.gov. This too was an area problem. The one item (I think) in the FCC questionaire that got immediate attention from VZ was "BILLING" I stated that I had 'NOT asked' for reimbersement for interupted service. This complaint got a quick response from a high level VZ P.R. rep, within one week of filing the 'on-line' paperwork This VZ PR lady accomplished a resolution from the top, down .. also a 6 week credit refund - then a follow-up from FCC.gov

Just how do you think these guys have the power to influence a government as large as ours? Your next target is not even a true political party. Are you liberals so afraid of the dark that you complain about shadows? Meanwhile back in Washington everyday brings some new revelation about the poor decision-making, hiring practices and oversight of this corrupt administration. All the scandals going on in Washington and you spend your time complaining about TV and radio personalities? I used to think you had some sort of hidden agenda like your favorite President, but now I have to back off...I don't think you’re that smart. Then you claim, like your hero, that this is ‘no there, there’. You claim that all the bad stuff is being made up by Fox News, but half of Washington is tied up in hearing because of details in the IG’s report that the administration didn’t think would be found. Each day bring yet another different explanation about Benghazi. Boy, Fox News must really have some power! If they are that powerful, perhaps they should be running the country?
